body:
I hope you can understand my English ... I speak Spanish but I have studied Japanese to be able to read the manga of hoyoyo hHAHAHAH

Does anyone know the social networks that Hoyoyo uses? I would like to know what other projects he works on.

The chapter begins with the mother giving her son a blowjob, he wakes up and says "What are you doing? ... She answers: I came to wake you up and I saw that you were" hard "so thank me for what I am doing.

After some dialogues the son says "Accept that you came to my room because you are excited and you want my cock"

She says no, but then her son puts his cock in her and she lets out a groan ... her father almost listens to them but he only says that he will leave the house.

When that happens the son says "Do you want me to stop? Do you want me to take my cock out? ... And the mother yells:" No, please ... I need your cock, it's big, thick ... mother also accepts and confesses that she entered her son's room because she wanted to have sex with him, etc, etc ...

They have sex until they cum ... At the end, the son says: "We still have time, let's do it one more time" The mother says: "No, it's time to stop"
But her son ignores what she says and they continue to have sex ... The End!
